EmailTemplate.description: Email notification sent to Event Team Member User on creation.
EmailTemplate.name: evNew Event Team Member Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Invite your Guests to {!Event_Team_Member__c.Event__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Event_Team_Member__c.Team_Member__c}
You have been added as a Team Member on the {!Event_Team_Member__c.Event__c} event.
You may invite {!Event_Team_Member__c.Maximum_Number_of_Proposed_Invitees__c} Guests. Please add your Relationship Contacts to the Event from the Contact Tab.
Thank You
